text: haey nowpel del puok anak ban b pea ch b kechchakar ha chchi sapvokrob chaur puok anak romluk tow champoh a l laoh brieb dauchchea kar romluk robsa puok anak champoh chidaunchitea robsa puok anak ryy romluk aoy leusa pi nih . haey knongchamnaom mnoussa lok mean anak buongsuong som tha ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung. saum trong me tda bratan aoy puok yeung(mean sokhpheap la tropy sa mb te d ning kaunchaw..) nowknong lokey nih phng . bo nde now thngai barlok ke min ttuol ban phl avei laey
